articles.title: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) Declares Quarterly Dividend of $1.51
articles.description: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) declared a quarterly dividend on Monday, October 6th. Shareholders of record on Monday, October 20th will be given a dividend of 1.51 per share by the industrial products company on Thursday, November 20th. This represents a c) dividend on an annualized basis and a yield of 1.2%.

articles.title: African players in Europe: Ghana trio score before World Cup ties
articles.description: Ghana stars Antoine Semenyo, Mohammed Kudus and Inaki Williams warmed up for crucial 2026 World Cup qualifiers by scoring in the top European leagues at the weekend. Semenyo struck twice as Bournemouth beat Fulham and Kudus was the match-winner for Tottenham Hotspur at Leeds United in the Premier League.

articles.title: French PM Lecornu quits a day after naming cabinet
articles.description: Prime Minister Sébastian Lecornu quit on Monday morning less than 24 hours after unveiling his cabinet. He tended his resignation to France's President Emmanuel Macron who accepted his decision, the Elysée Palace said.

articles.description: Dawson Geophysical Company (NASDAQ:DWSN - Get Free Report) was the recipient of a significant decline in short interest during the month of September. As of September 15th, there was short interest totaling 94,100 shares, a decline of 33.5% from the August 31st total of 141,400 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 130,000 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.7 days. Based on an average daily volume of 130,000 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.7 days.
